entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High 11.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind light except northeast 30 km/h through mainland inlets and valleys early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
